content: colorful armwarmers with thumb some ribbing fair isle & lace make it as simple or complicated as you want if you re a beginner it s a nice way to learn some new things ratjetoe = dutch for hodgepodge is a diverse project to use up your leftovers and experiment with colors and stitch patterns i wrote down the pattern for the left armwarmer as a guideline but feel free to make an unique one with your own colors and stitches as you can see i ended up with two different ones and with some color combinations i wouldn t have chosen normally i ran out of my favorite leftovers but that made it interesting and challenging happy knitting
